'''WildBrain Studios''' is the in-house television studio arm of the Canadian entertainment company {{W|WildBrain}} based in Vancouver, which was originally established in 2016 as '''DHX Studios'''. The company is currently producing the upcoming ''[[Minecraft]]'' [[Minecraft Animated Series|animated series]] with [[Mojang Studios]] for the [[Netflix]] streaming service. Prior to being involved with ''Minecraft'', they were famously known for producing children's shows, including ''{{W|Blaze and the Monster Machines}}'' and ''{{W|The Mr. Peabody & Sherman Show}}'', the latter of which was also a Netflix exclusive.
